title: 好消息，質疑中國數據清醒國家再ㄧ國。唐寧街十號質疑中國數據，有可能重新思考對中政策
contents:
China's efforts to blame coronavirus on a US army delegation to Wuhan infuriate No. 10 as Boris Johnson's advisers say Beijing's statistics on its cases could be downplayed by a factor of 40



https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-8163707/amp/Chinas-efforts-blame-coronavirus-army-delegation-Wuhan-infuriate-No-10.html?__twitter_impression=true

————
強森看起來憔悴
能讓英國人講出這種話也滿不容易的
